title: Illaoi Q hitbox larger than what is indicated
body:
Not sure if this has been covered yet but can something be done regarding Illaoi's Q (and subsequent tentacle slams) hitbox? On many occasions laning against her and with her I have/the enemy has been well out of the range indicator and was still hit. This is obnoxious to lane against and makes for a very frustrating experience that doesn't reward skill. Does this skill have added splash damage or something?

This is also not isolated to Illaoi as other champions have similar issues. Please fix it.
